snippet: LEVINE--Noel. The Palm Beach Country Club expresses its profound sorrow at the passing of its esteemed member Noel Levine, and extends sincere sympathy to his wife Harriette and their two daughters Denise Saul and Caryn Harris and other members of his family. Jeffrey B. Lane President Warren Spector, Secretary 1/3
lead_paragraph: LEVINE--Noel. The Palm Beach Country Club expresses its profound sorrow at the passing of its esteemed member Noel Levine, and extends sincere sympathy to his wife Harriette and their two daughters Denise Saul and Caryn Harris and other members of his family. Jeffrey B. Lane President Warren Spector, Secretary 1/3
